did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Record Book of the University of Arizona Alumni Association 1897-1937
did.abstract: Typescript and holograph, with letters laid in. Includes personal signatures of members and homecoming registrants. Also includes letters from Governors George W.P. Hunt and Thomas Edward Campbell.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into 5 series.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Typescript and holograph, with letters laid in. Includes personal signatures of members and homecoming registrants. Also includes letters from Governors George W.P. Hunt and Thomas Edward Campbell.
